sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart type="line" height="300"  :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"SplineChart",
  props:['data'],
    data: function() {
      return {
        chartOptions: {
          chart: {
            id: 'line_chart',
          },
          xaxis: {
            categories: this.chartData.categories,
          },
          title: {
          text: "Doanh thu (triệu VND)",
          align: "center", 
          margin: 20, 
          style: {
            fontSize: "18px", 
            fontWeight: "bold", 
            color: "#333", 
          },
        },
          
        },
        series: [{
          name: 'Doanh thu',
          data: this.chartDatarevenueByMonth,
          
        }],
        
      }
    },
    computed: {
    // Tạo computed property cho categories và revenueByMonth
    chartData() {
      const categories = Array.from({ length: 12 }, (v, i) => `${i + 1}`);
      const revenueByMonth = this.data.reduce((acc, item) => {
        if (item._id && item.totalRevenue) {
          acc[item._id - 1] = item.totalRevenue / 1000000;
        }
        return acc;
      }, new Array(12).fill(0));

      return {
        categories,
        revenueByMonth
      };
    },
  }
  }
</script>
